name: QuickMessages-Reborn
description: Save messages to quickly send them later. Right-click the chat bar to save or send messages. Hold Shift while clicking a message to delete it.
author: Pharaoh2k
features: Save frequently used messages for instant reuse
Save selected text or entire messages
Shift+Click to delete messages or categories
Insert saved messages into chat instantly
Settings panel to view and manage all saved items
Automatic update checking with changelog display
Discord theme integration for seamless UI
Support for Discord formatting and emojis
Text truncation for long messages in menu
Delete all data option in settings
